column4: How do I get bitchx to show up in apt? I already added universe to my sources.list
i thought bitchx was history
haven't used any flavor of linux for like a year... what's another good irc client i can run from the terminal?
i don't think bitchx exists any more
irssi
thanks
cause I don't like xchat :)
irssi is pretty much the most popular cli client
thanks for the info
do you have a recommendation for a terminal emulator?
i use konsole and xterm.
kubuntu?
rxvt or urxvt is good also.
originally kubuntu, but now i run fluxbox. i do have some kde apps, though
yeah i decided to install openbox; i'm simply leveraging ubuntu's repositories :)
heh. well, konsole suits me fine ... slow to start up, like many kde apps. but pretty nice otherwise
thanks i'll give rxvt or urxvt a try
those are lighter
do either of them have tabs?
i don't remember. you may want something like konsole (or gnome-terminal) for that
i run everything inside of 'screen' so i don't use tabs
